ai_business_context: A demo environment for staff to triage and close the loop on facility feedback.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories. When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: spill, trash, dirty, smell, odor, sticky, pests, mold, hygiene, cleaning
issue_categories.description: Cleaning, spills, odors, waste, and general hygiene concerns.
issue_categories.label: Cleanliness & Hygiene

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: toilet, sink, soap, paper towel, hand dryer, clogged, leak, restroom
issue_categories.description: Restroom fixtures, supplies, plumbing, and cleanliness specific to restrooms.
issue_categories.label: Restrooms

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: light, lighting, bulb, flicker, dark, outlet, power, breaker
issue_categories.description: Lighting, outlets, and minor electrical issues.
issue_categories.label: Electrical & Lighting

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: hvac, hot, cold, temperature, thermostat, air, vent, stuffy, humid
issue_categories.description: Heating, cooling, ventilation, and comfort issues.
issue_categories.label: HVAC & Thermal Comfort

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: elevator, lift, stuck, door, call button, floor indicator
issue_categories.label: Elevator

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: door, lock, badge, access, key, handle, latch, security
issue_categories.description: Access control, locks, doors, and security-related facility issues.
issue_categories.label: Access & Security

issue_categories.description: Noise levels, soundproofing, and acoustic comfort.
issue_categories.label: Noise & Acoustics

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: chair, desk, table, wobble, broken, furniture, whiteboard
issue_categories.description: Furniture damage, wear, and usability issues.
issue_categories.label: Furniture & Fixtures

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: projector, tv, display, hdmi, mic, speaker, zoom room, conference
issue_categories.description: Conference room AV and meeting technology issues.
issue_categories.label: AV & Meeting Tech

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: coffee, fridge, microwave, dishwasher, kitchenette, breakroom, water
issue_categories.description: Kitchenette and breakroom appliances and supplies.
issue_categories.label: Kitchen & Breakroom

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: parking, garage, gate, pothole, oil, stripe, signage
issue_categories.description: Parking areas, garage, and exterior access/conditions.
issue_categories.label: Parking & Exterior

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: trip, slip, hazard, broken glass, sharp, unsafe, emergency, exit
issue_categories.label: Safety Hazard

issue_categories.description: Use when none of the other categories fit. (Internal note: prefer specific categories; use other only when unsure.)
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Vendor ticket opened. If it gets stuck again, please note the time and floor so we can pull logs.

issues.description: The elevator doors on the 1st floor hesitate and sometimes reopen 2–3 times before closing. It adds a noticeable delay and feels unreliable.

reports.body: Elevator doors keep bouncing open on the 1st floor. Took ~30 seconds to finally close.
Noticed the elevator door sensor seems overly sensitive—doors reopen even when no one is near.
Happened again this morning around 9:10am. Doors reopened multiple times before moving.

issues.title: Elevator doors repeatedly reopening on 1st floor

updates.message: Acknowledged. Facilities contacted elevator vendor to inspect door sensor and alignment.
Vendor scheduled for on-site visit; monitoring for additional incidents.

comments.body: Thanks—refill added to the daily checklist for this restroom.

issues.description: Women's restroom is frequently out of paper towels; the dispenser is empty and people are leaving with wet hands.

reports.body: Paper towel dispenser is empty in the women’s restroom again.
No paper towels—only the hand dryer, which is super weak.
Still empty as of this afternoon (around 3pm).

issues.title: Paper towels frequently empty in women's restroom

updates.message: Restocked paper towels and checked spare inventory in janitorial closet.
Adjusted replenishment schedule to include midday check.

issues.description: The open office on the north side of the 2nd floor feels noticeably warm and stuffy in the afternoons. Airflow from vents seems low.

reports.body: It’s been hot in the north open office after lunch for the last few days.
Air feels stale near the windows; vent output seems weak compared to the hallway.

issues.title: Warm, low airflow in 2nd floor north open office

updates.message: Acknowledged. Facilities to check VAV settings and confirm vent airflow readings.

issues.description: One of the ceiling lights in the mailroom corridor flickers intermittently, especially in the morning. It’s distracting and makes the area feel dim.

reports.body: Light flickering in the corridor by the mailroom—looks like it’s about to go out.
Same flicker is still happening today; it’s the second fixture from the mailroom door.

issues.title: Flickering ceiling light near mailroom corridor

updates.message: Replacement LED driver ordered; temporary check confirmed fixture is intermittently failing.

comments.body: We’ll do an extra pass after lunch this week to see if it stays under control.

issues.description: Lobby trash can near the seating area is overflowing by mid-day and there’s often coffee cup lids and napkins on the floor.

reports.body: Trash can in the lobby is overflowing again; trash on the floor near the chairs.
Lobby bin is full by noon most days—maybe needs a larger bin or more frequent pickup.
Noticed ants near the overflow yesterday (probably from food trash).

issues.title: Lobby trash overflowing by mid-day

updates.message: Added an extra trash pickup time (midday) and replaced liner.
Swapped to a larger bin and cleaned area around seating to address food residue.

issues.description: Conference Room B’s HDMI connection is unreliable; the display frequently shows 'No Signal' unless the cable is wiggled. This delays meetings.

reports.body: HDMI in Conf Room B keeps cutting out. Had to reconnect 3 times during a meeting.
The wall plate HDMI seems loose—if you touch the cable the screen goes black.
Still happening. We switched to wireless casting as a workaround.

issues.title: Conference Room B HDMI 'No Signal' issues

updates.message: Acknowledged. AV team to inspect wall plate and replace cable if needed.
Replaced HDMI cable and tightened wall plate connection; tested with two laptops.

comments.body: If you notice it propped open, please let us know the approximate time so we can review camera footage.

issues.description: The side entrance door doesn’t always latch fully. It looks closed but can be pushed open without a badge if it doesn’t catch.

reports.body: Side entrance door didn’t latch—was able to push it open after it 'closed'.
Noticed the latch issue too; seems worse when it’s windy.

issues.title: Side entrance door not latching reliably

updates.message: Acknowledged. Submitted work order to adjust strike plate and closer tension.
Temporary adjustment made; monitoring for recurrence before replacing hardware.

issues.description: The breakroom fridge on the 3rd floor has a strong sour smell and there’s liquid pooled under the bottom shelf. Might be a spill or a leak.

reports.body: 3rd floor fridge smells awful and there’s a puddle at the bottom.
I wiped it but it came back—could be leaking from a container or the fridge itself.

issues.title: Sour smell and pooling liquid in 3rd floor fridge

issues.description: There’s a loud rattling/whirring noise in the west hallway on the 2nd floor, likely from a vent or fan. It’s noticeable during calls.

reports.body: Rattling noise in the west hallway—sounds like a loose vent cover.
It’s loudest near the corner by the conference rooms; happens in bursts.
Still happening today; makes it hard to take calls while walking through.

issues.title: Rattling vent/fan noise in 2nd floor west hallway

updates.message: Acknowledged. Facilities to inspect vent covers and nearby fan unit for vibration.

issues.description: Oil slick on Garage Level 1 near the ramp is creating a slip hazard. It’s been there for at least a week and looks like it’s spreading.

reports.body: Oil on the garage floor near the ramp—almost slipped getting out of my car.
The oil patch is bigger now and there’s no cone/sign.

issues.title: Oil slick on Garage Level 1 near ramp

updates.message: Placed caution cones and absorbent pads; requested cleanup service.
Area cleaned and degreased; cones removed after surface dried.

issues.description: One of the chairs in the 2nd floor kitchenette has a loose leg and wobbles significantly. It feels unsafe to sit on.

reports.body: Wobbly chair in the kitchenette—front right leg is loose.
Almost tipped over when I sat down. Please remove it until fixed.

issues.title: Wobbly chair in 2nd floor kitchenette

updates.message: Removed chair from service and tightened hardware; tested for stability.

comments.body: If you see any remaining loose edges, please snap a photo and note the exact spot in the hallway.

issues.description: Carpet edge in the 3rd floor hallway is lifting near the middle section, creating a trip hazard. Several people have stumbled.

reports.body: Carpet is peeling up in the 3rd floor hallway—tripped a little but caught myself.
Same spot is still raised; should be taped down ASAP.

issues.title: Lifted carpet edge creating trip hazard on 3rd floor

updates.message: Applied temporary carpet tape and placed a small caution marker.
Carpet edge re-secured and trimmed; removed marker after inspection.

locations.full_path: HQ / 2nd Floor / Conference Rooms / Conference Room B
locations.name: Conference Room B
